item.title: How to Create Design Brief for Design Project Made for Production;
item.description:
In today’s post I will share with you how to create a design brief to participate in international competition held by an Italian university called Poli.Design; Save this post for future competition dates, specially if you are a design or industrial design student;

The challenge of this competition was to design different types of chairs, interpreting values and identity of Porada, and the guidelines that will inspire the partecipants will be innovation, originality and search of new design solutions for woodworking.

item.title: Welcome to N Design Studyosu;
item.description:
At NDesignStudio & Affiliate Partners, we work with you to optimize your business from the top down. As an award-winning design Studio, our group of professional engineers and social media content planners are always here to help your business get off the ground and grow.

Meet Nemah;the founder of the Studio; she has a masters of marketing from Marmara University, Istanbul, TÃ¼rkiye.Your Personal Branding and Design Expert; She is an experienced systems and network engineer and front-end designer with 7 years of experience. Experienced in analyzing software features and sales and marketing for them. Excited to help your company in branding and expanding online presence via social media engagement with captivating content, video and static assets. She is Scrum methodologies associate and Agile track follower.. Certified in Turkish Labor Law;
